itunes:title: Genesis Week 4 with Kelly Minter
title: Genesis Week 4 with Kelly Minter
description:
It’s the fourth week of the SRT Genesis reading plan, and Raechel and Amanda sit down with the multi-talented Kelly Minter to go deep. With the stories of Rachel, Leah, Jacob, and Joseph open before them, they talk about jealousy and grace, wrestling with God, and waiting on the Lord’s perfect timing. Kelly opens up about the beauty that emerged from a decade of darkness in her life, and the trio discusses what it looks like to surrender our desires to the Lord.

Read with Us: 

This episode corresponds to Week 4 of the She Reads Truth Genesis: Back to the Beginning reading plan found on the She Reads Truth app and SheReadsTruth.com. 


Shop the Genesis collection at ShopSheReadsTruth.com 

Save 15% on your first She Reads Truth Subscription Box when you use the code BOX15. 


Show notes can be found at shereadstruth.com/podcast/genesis-week-4/
